definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
unit of area equal to 100 畝|亩[mu3] or 6.67 hectares/a short while/a little while ago/circa. (for approximate dates)
to incline/to lean/to slant/to slope/to tilt
to say everything (that is on one's mind)
coming from everywhere/from all over the place/gorgeous (of woman)/to ruin and overturn the state
to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to capsize/to collapse/to overturn/to overthrow/to undermine

sentences.english: My house is a decayed house.
sentences.chinese: 我的房子是一幢傾圮的房屋。

sentences.english: You should not be tilted sideways, backward, or forwards.
sentences.chinese: 你不能斜傾，後仰或前傾。

sentences.english: This paper presents a roll control scheme for four-wheel steering(4WS) vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 基於4輪轉向車輛，提出了一種新的主動抗側傾方法。

sentences.english: As you inhale, press in with your thumbs and bring your hips forward.
sentences.chinese: 當你吸氣時，用拇指壓住然後把你的腰往前傾。

sentences.english: Why can't I railing my board today?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我今天沒能把帆板傾起來？

sentences.english: The result is of practical significance in design of pantograph tilting mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 爲受電弓傾擺機構的設計開發提供了依據。

sentences.english: He put the fat body slightly leftward , giving you an impression that he was making hard effort.
sentences.chinese: 他肥胖的身子向左微傾，顯出努力的樣子。

sentences.english: The two corresponded with appreciation and even with signs of affection.
sentences.chinese: 兩人相互欣賞，甚至流露傾慕之意。

sentences.english: She buckled herself to the work.
Oil in the Shijiutuo Uplift and the inclined end migrated from northwest.
sentences.chinese: 石臼坨凸起及傾沒端油氣是從西北方向運移和注入的。

sentences.english: From the beam of an empty room your nest will fall.
sentences.chinese: 卻不道人去梁空巢也傾。

sentences.english: She strained herself to a final burst of speed.
sentences.chinese: 她傾全力溘然加速作最後衝刺。

sentences.english: The bridge failed to hold and crashed into the river below.
sentences.chinese: 大橋頂不住了，傾坍到河裏。

sentences.english: The boat heeled over in a strong wind.
Sommer pours a great deal of creative energy into his projects.
sentences.chinese: 薩默傾在他的工作上注了大量的創造力。

sentences.english: Consider segmenting guests by their tendency to post or participate in social media.
sentences.chinese: 利用客人蔘與社會媒體的傾向來分析客人種類。

definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to monopolize/to seize/to take into one's arms/to embrace/to fasten (with a rope etc)/to take on (responsibility etc)/to canvass
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
